title: Disabling 'Dying Walk' in Yakuza Kiwami
snippet: Kiryu having stomachacheIntroductionI recently installed Yakuza Kiwami again just because I miss abusing Tiger Drop.They nerfed this move in the next series released after Yakuza Kiwami because how overpowered it was,not to mention you can literally one hit bosses with 4 health bar if you buff yo...
